live_updates: Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services. A further update will be provided at 12:15 MT. Thank you for your patience.

61136.summary: Some customers in Fort Saskatchewan are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61136.title: May 13 - Fort Saskatchewan | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
